column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was expecting sooooo much deliciousness... I ate at another deep dish pizza restaurant the other day that was rated 3.5 and loved it... I thought
column3: if this is 3.5 star pizza I can't wait to try this 4 star pizza...sadly
column4: this place didn't live up to the hype I've been reading about. We got the sausage deep dish and a thin cheese crust for the kids. The sausage deep dish had a layer of sauce
column6: cheese and more sauce. I'm used to pieces of sausage in my pizza and didn't really like the sausage layer that covered the whole pizza. Crust was crispy which I thought I would love
column7: but just didn't do it for me. All in all good pizza
